alert.note: Alert for Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 22 at 11:58PM CDT until April 23 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM MDT FOR KEITH COUNTY... At 1057 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Lemoyne to near Big Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Brule, Lemoyne, Keystone, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Eagle Gulch Campground, Ruthon, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Nevens, Megeath, Broganville, Otter Creek Campground, Lake View Campground and Belmar. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 80 and 109. Highway 92 between mile markers 119 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 109 and 144. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
